name: Burning Spirit
description:
You are playing as a tree spirit who is trying to save the forest from total disaster. Protect the sacred tree by defeating enemies with something you know the best - the power of cards.

! For the full experience, we strongly encourage you to lose at least once in this game :) !

Control the game using WSAD/Arrows and space and play the biggest card battles with your mouse.

All graphics were made by puddingzserem, music was created with the hands of Goshargo. Me (Adnovac) and dotpoozer were responsible for coding and other nerd stuff.

Team members:
- Adnovac
- dotpoozer 
- puddingzserem
- Goshargo

Game created for Ludum Dare game jam 50
